original_title: Joint Chiefs Gen. Caine hosts NATO allies to discuss Ukraine security guarantees | Fox News
article_summary: High-level military talks held in Washington and Brussels discuss potential security guarantees for Ukraine to prevent Russian aggression, following President Trump's suggestion of U.S. air support. The NATO Chiefs of Defense meeting is set to coordinate next steps, with the aim of offering Kyiv credible security guarantees while avoiding direct escalation with Russia.</s>
